summary: SummaryCetaphil Gentle Exfoliating SA Cleanser cleanses to gently promote skin surface turnover for visibly smooth and even skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle enough for daily use on sensitive skinGet softer, smoother, more even-looking skin in 1 weekChemically exfoliates to remove dead skin cells and refine textureReduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation and post acne marksHelps balance excess surface oils And preserve the skin barrierDefends against 5 signs of skin sensitivityKey IngredientsSALICYLIC ACID BHA - gently sloughs dead skin cells, exfoliates and helps control excess surface oilsGLUCONOLACTONE PHA - also exfoliates and helps skin retain moisture by preserving the natural barrierMANDELIC ACID AHA - loosens bonds between dead surface layers to reveal radiant skinFormulated WithoutParabensHypoallergenicFragranceItem 2629232How To UseUse daily before moisturizer.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco Glucoside, Gluconolactone, Betaine, Peg-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Glycereth-26 Salicylic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Mandelic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Pantolactone.

reviews.headline: Smoother Skin
reviews.comments: I usually like the vanicream cleanser but over the summer I need something with a little more oomph. Using a straight up acne cleanser daily dries out my oily skin and makes it oilier. This has been perfect for everyday use withouth overdrying and has become a staple in my skin care routine.

reviews.headline: Highly Recommend.
reviews.comments: I rarely write reviews, but this is the best facial cleanser I have ever used. Ever. Cursed with very large, dark, stubborn nose pores and oil slick skin on my face since puberty (thanks dad) and with a couple of weeks using mainly this, my pores are smaller than a pin-head. Completely cleared out. It gently rinses away all oiliness on my skin as well, no over drying. But I feel like it may over dry if you don't have truly OILY skin type. I make sure to exfoliate really well before using this, so it's not wasted on trying to clear away a ton of dead skin and can actually get into my pores and treat them. Magical, gentle stuff for overly oily people who are on the sensitive side. Can't recommend enough.

reviews.headline: Reaction
reviews.comments: Ive been on a constant journey of trying to figure out how to clear my skin from acne and dark spots. I've seen great things about the Cetaphil line and figured I'd give them a try when Ulta had a sale a few weeks ago. I purchased this cleanser and the corresponding moisturizer. The first two weeks were fine, however at the start of week two, my face and neck were itchy all over. I'd never had that kind of reaction before. The next day I had little bumps all over my forehead, cheeks, and neck. Maybe my skin was too sensitive. With thi being my first time trying Cetaphil, I'm skeptical to try an alternative cleanser from this brand.

reviews.headline: Not for cystic acne
reviews.comments: If you're very acne prone and have sensitive skin, this is not a good cleanser to go for , it completely dried out my skin. It made me so itchy, and my acne more inflamed , I would say this is more for hydrating skin that looks dull.

reviews.headline: dry skin approved
reviews.comments: I have VERY dry skin, so dry I only wash my face once a day every evening, and only rinse my face with water in the morning. I usually use a gentle hydrating cleanser, however I started getting milia bumps due to never being able to exfoliate. my skin has never been able to handle salicylic acid, however it can with this product! I've been using it 5 nights in a row and have not experienced any skin reactions, and have seen improvement in the milia bumps. I immediately follow up with a good moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Best product ever
reviews.comments: I grabbed this beauty from their popup shop in NYC and fell in love. I have combination skin and granted I dont get acne but its such a good cleanser!. Definitely wipes off the extra oil.

reviews.headline: Love it !
reviews.comments: so glad cetaphil joined in and got a SA line ! Its super gentle , does dry you out but also helps smooth the skin !

reviews.headline: Too gentleâ€¦
reviews.comments: Did not get any of my makeup off..dont buy it

reviews.headline: Great gentle salicylic acid cleanser
reviews.comments: I purchased it because my 13 year old started having small breakouts. He uses it after school and it helps alot. He has dry skin amd break outs and this works great foe him ans doesnt dry him out. I have adult breakouts due to PCOS amd this cleanser has done wonders for my oily acne prone skin.
